Article.Title: Microsoft working on some sort of new product
Article.Content: Something cryptic is going on. Apparently Microsoft is gearing up for a $300 million "creative consumer assignment" for a "brand new product." McCann Erickson, Microsoft’s current ad agency of choice, is allegedly pitching ideas as is Crispin Porter & Bogusky, ad wizards behind the Burger King commercials. If it’s being kept secret to create buzz, allow me to future-post some news about this product just to get it out of the way. 11/19/07: Microsoft secret product leaked. 01/15/08: Scheduled date for Microsoft secret product unveiling. 01/16/08: Microsoft reports that secret product will be delayed until 03/15/08. 03/15/08: Microsoft announces that new secret product coming last day of spring. 06/20/08: Microsoft petitions to have last day of spring changed to 11/19/08. 11/19/08: Microsoft denies secret new product existed, promises Vista Service Pack 1 coming by end of the year. Is Microsoft Set To Roll Out A Brand New Consumer Product? [ActiveWin.com]
